messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Virus When Opening Some Messages?
messages.msgSnippet: Someone was posting on another list about this and said it was being discussed on another list they were on. They said it was a problem when you go to the
messages.messageBody:
Someone was posting on another list about this and said it was being
discussed on another list they were on. They said it was a problem when you
go to the Yahoo Group site and read messages from there. I haven't been
going to the Yahoo group site and I haven't had a problem with my email
messages so I don't know.

--
Dianne in Tacoma WA
Clearly the problems we suffer cannot be solved at the same level of
thinking with which we created them.
- Albert Einstein

messages.subject: Virus When Opening Some Messages?
messages.msgSnippet: I ve encountered viruses by clicking to read posts twice this week...on this message board.  Is anyone else experiencing this? When I click on the subject,
messages.messageBody:
I've encountered viruses by clicking to read posts twice this week...on this message board. Is anyone else experiencing this?

When I click on the subject, rather than the post showing up, something pops up saying my computer has a virus and it needs to run a scan (but it's NOT my virus software). I'm able to do click "control, alt, delete" to start my task manager and "end task." Then I open my virus software and sweep my computer--one time it found a 5 risk virus (very bad) and the other time it only found 1 and 2 risk spy cookies (not bad).

Just curious if anyone else has encountered the same problem.
